description: Registry of available RNA motif databases

HL.name: Hairpin Loops
HL.description: Hairpin loop motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

IL.name: Internal Loops
IL.description: Internal loop motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

J3.name: 3-Way Junctions
J3.description: 3-way junction motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

J4.name: 4-Way Junctions
J4.description: 4-way junction motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

J5.name: 5-Way Junctions
J5.description: 5-way junction motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

J6.name: 6-Way Junctions
J6.description: 6-way junction motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

J7.name: 7-Way Junctions
J7.description: 7-way junction motifs from RNA 3D Motif Atlas

pdb_index.notes: PDB index is automatically generated when plugin loads by scanning all motif files and extracting PDB IDs
